flawed_nl_solution:
At least one person lives in 17/20 * 120 = <<17/20*120=120>>120 apartments.
At least two persons live in 3/5 * 120 = <<3/5*120=72>>72 apartments.
So in every of the 120 - 72 = <<48*1=48>>48 apartments, only one person is living.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 102, not 120. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
